title: Small Business Still Wants More Workers
sub_head: The latest NFIB employment report shows the desire to hire remains near record levels.
body:
U.S. consumers feel the pain of rising inflation and interest rates, but they still enjoy abundant options for generating an income. Small firms are zealously seeking workers and also raising compensation to attract them. Thatâ€™s according to the May employment report from the National Federation of Independent Business, due out later today.
NFIB Chief Economist William Dunkelberg reports:
